mapper.insert: replace into sys_sms_task ( sign_id, sms_title, mould_id, file_path, sms_state, cre_time, upd_time )values( #{sign_id}, #{sms_title}, #{mould_id}, #{file_path}, #{sms_state}, now(), now() )

insert into sys_sms_info (sms_id,sms_rec_obj,sms_content,sms_state,sid,cre_time,upd_time) values
( #{item.sms_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sms_rec_obj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sms_content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sms_state,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now() )
mapper.select:
select o.*,s.sign_name as sign_name,m.mould_name as mould_name,m.mould_type, m.mould_content as mould_content from sys_sms_task o left join sys_sign_info s on o.sign_id =s.sign_id left join sys_mould_info m on o.mould_id = m.mould_id
order by o.upd_time desc
select sign_id as sign_id,sign_name as sign_name from sys_sign_info where sign_type=0 order by upd_time desc
select mould_content as mould_content,mould_name as mould_name from sys_mould_info where mould_type=0 order by upd_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into sys_sms_num_reply ( sms_id, phone_num, sms_state, cre_time, upd_time, fee, sid, remarks )values( #{sms_id}, #{phone_num}, #{sms_state}, now(), now(), #{fee}, #{sid}, #{remarks} )
mapper.select: select send_id from sys_sms_info where sms_id = #{id}
